product_name: Canari Vortex Gel Bike Shorts - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The 8-panel women's Canari Vortex shorts feature an anatomic design and a gel chamois for great fit and riding comfort. Nylon/spandex fabric offers firm stretch and fit to support your muscles; shorts are also breathable and quick drying. Gel pad absorbs road shock and reduces nerve stress and saddle pressure. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Elasticized waist and soft-touch leg grippers help keep shorts from bunching as you ride. Closeout.
short_description: The 8-panel women's Canari Vortex shorts feature an anatomic design and a gel chamois for great fit and riding comfort.
